field.name: attendance_ids
field.eval: [ Command.clear(), Command.create({'name': 'Monday Morning', 'dayofweek': '0', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Monday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '0', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), Command.create({'name': 'Tuesday Morning', 'dayofweek': '1', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Tuesday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '1', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), Command.create({'name': 'Wednesday Morning', 'dayofweek': '2', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Wednesday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '2', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), Command.create({'name': 'Thursday Morning', 'dayofweek': '3', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Thursday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '3', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), Command.create({'name': 'Friday Morning', 'dayofweek': '4', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Friday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '4', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), Command.create({'name': 'Saturday Morning', 'dayofweek': '5', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Saturday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '5', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), Command.create({'name': 'Sunday Morning', 'dayofweek': '6', 'hour_from': 10, 'hour_to': 16, 'day_period': 'morning'}), Command.create({'name': 'Sunday Afternoon', 'dayofweek': '6', 'hour_from': 16, 'hour_to': 22.0, 'day_period': 'afternoon'}), ]
